name: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys
description:
Neon Fantasy: Monkeys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

Neon Fantasy: Monkeys is a puzzle game featuring beautiful monkeys in a neon style.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of neon monkeys that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.

The game features several levels of difficulty, allowing you to choose the optimal level for your experience and mood. Regardless of the difficulty, you can enjoy high-quality images of monkeys in bright neon style.

In Neon Fantasy: Monkeys:

•50 levels
•Neon art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music
